preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 10 g of Ge using a precision scale.
2. Measure out 80 g of Pr.
3. Measure out 150 g of Si.
4. Measure out 120 g of Zr.
5. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all measured materials thoroughly to ensure uniform distribution.
